MartialArts.name: taekwondo
MartialArts.description: Taekwondo is a Korean martial art founded by Choi Hong Hi and a couple of army officials and martial artists. It was developed during and after the second world war to solidify the Korean martial arts scene.

MartialArts.name: combat sambo
MartialArts.description: The next martial art on today’s list is Sambo. Sambo is a Russian martial art, developed around the 1920s in the USSR to improve the Russian military’s hand-to-hand combat skills. Much akin to modern MMA, it features a combination of strikes, kicks, clinches, throws, grappling, wrestling, and more.

MartialArts.name: karate
MartialArts.description: The next martial art on our list today is the world-famous Karate. Contrary to popular belief it isn’t Japanese, but rather Okinawan. Though it is a part of Japan today, Okinawa was actually an independent country and is the home for most of what we now know of as Japanese martial arts.

MartialArts.name: Judo
MartialArts.descritpion: The next martial art on the list is Judo. It is one of the most popular martial arts in the world and been known to be the martial art of choice for a wide variety of people, whether they are MMA fighters or even the president of Russia.

MartialArts.name: boxing
MartialArts.description: Boxing deserves a high placement in any self-defense article and is often not given its due respect. Western Boxing has origins that can be traced back thousands and thousands of years to ancient civilizations, and there was never a specific moment in time when boxing became mainstream.

MartialArts.name: wrestling
MartialArts.description: Western wrestling, often referred to as Greco-Roman Wrestling or French Wrestling is a sport that dates back to perhaps more than 15000 years ago. It is a form of combat that has been depicted in cave drawings, suggesting that it might be as old as humans themselves.

MartialArts.name: Muay Thai (and Kickboxing)
MartialArts.description: The next martial art/s on the list is Muay Thai. Though there are some relatively significant differences, I consider Kickboxing to be as effective as Muay Thai and definitely in the same league, which is why all that I will write in this section represents both of these incredible martial arts.

MartialArts.name: Jiu-Jitsu
MartialArts.description: At the 4th place on today’s list, we have the favorite martial arts of some of the most popular commentators and practitioners in the world of martial arts and combat sports like Jocko WIllink and Joe Rogan. Jiu-Jitsu is arguably the martial art with the steepest rise to fame, seeing as some of the main founders have just passed away a couple of decades ago.

MartialArts.name: Krav Maga
MartialArts.description: The bronze-medal goes to Krav Maga, a military combat system designed to prepare people in the toughest of places to be able to neutralize threats as quickly and as efficiently as possible. It is also the fighting system taught to the Israeli military, which is partly what gives it its good reputation.

MartialArts.name: Mixed Martial Arts
MartialArts.descripton: MMA, or mixed martial arts, isn’t a singular entity. It is basically a process, within which the given individual tries their best to become the best all-around fighter. This means placing a large emphasis on striking, wrestling, grappling, and more; virtually all the areas of fighting that humans have come up with to date.

MartialArts.name: Krav Maga + MMA
MartialArts.description: What could possibly come after MMA, you ask? Well, combining it with Krav Maga. Though an MMA fighter will likely beat any single-discipline fighter out there, a fighter who also knows how to use illegal moves and is also an MMA fighter will be an absolute beast.

Instructors.name: Angela Lee
Instructors.description: A rising star of Singaporean-Korean descent, Angela come from a family of impressive martial artists trained by her father who holds Black Belts in three different martial arts disciplines including a 1st Degree Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and a 6th Degree Hapdosool Master Black Belt, and her mother who holds a 5th Degree Hapdosool Master Black Belt.
Instructors.credentials: She is the current ONE Atomweight World Champion, a 2-time Pankration World Champion and a Wrestling State Champion. She has competed in and won numerous World, National, and Regional martial arts competitions such as the World Pankration Athlima Federation World Championships and FILA World Championships. She also holds a 1st degree Black Belt in Taekwondo and TDS, and a Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu.

Instructors.name: Shinya Aoki
Instructors.description: Shinya is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore on a seasonal basis. A Black Belt in both Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and Judo, he is a 4x ONE Championship Lightweight World Champion. He was also the DREAM FC Lightweight World Champion. Shinya is widely regarded as the #1 pound-for-pound MMA fighter in Asia. He brings over 20 years of martial arts experience to Evolve MMA, competing at the highest levels in the world. He is currently the top BJJ Black Belt in Japan, and he has won every major BJJ tournament in Japan. For MMA, Shinya Aoki has won every major title in Japan including Shooto, DEEP, and DREAM.
Instructors.credentials: He holds a Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu under the legendary Yuki Nakai, the 1st BJJ Black Belt in Japan under Carlos Gracie Jr.
Instructors.specialties: Jing Nan holds a Purple Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu.

Instructors.name: Xiong Jing Nan
Instructors.description: Xiong Jing Nan is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. She is the ONE Women’s Strawweight World Champion and China’s first-ever mixed martial arts World Champion. Before transitioning to mixed martial arts, she represented China in boxing internationally. Jing Nan is also a China Open BJJ Champion.
Instructors.credentials: Superfight Record:2-0, Fight Con (2017), Arte Suave (2017)

Instructors.name: Rafael Dos Anjos
Instructors.credentials: Professor, Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and MMA World Champion

Instructors.name: Demetrious Johnson
Instructors.description: Demetrious Johnson is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore on a seasonal basis. He is widely regarded as the greatest pound-for-pound mixed martial artist in history. As the UFC Flyweight World Champion, he broke the record for the most number of world title defenses (11) in the UFC. Known for his speed and explosive wrestling, he has landed the most takedowns in UFC flyweight history. Demetrious is a multiple-time Fighter of the Year Award winner.
Instructors.credentials: Demetrious currently competes in ONE Championship and is a member of the prestigious Evolve Fight Team. Demetrious is the current ONE Flyweight World Champion.

Instructors.name: Nong-O Gaiyanghadao
Instructors.description: Nong-O Gaiyanghadao, formerly known as Nong-O Sit Or, is considered to be one of the best pound for pound Muay Thai fighters in the world today. Nong-O is known for the incredible speed, power and precision behind all his strikes.
Instructors.credentials: Nong-O is a five-division multiple-time World Champion, 4x Lumpinee Muay Thai World Champion, 1x Rajadamnern Muay Thai World Champion, 2x Thailand National Champion, 3x Fighter of the Year, and more. He is also the current and first-ever ONE Bantamweight Muay Thai World Champion.

Instructors.name: Adam Shahir Kayoom
Instructors.description: Adam is the Head Coach of the famed EVOLVE Fight Team at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. Adam started training in Judo and Tae Kwon Do as a child, but found BJJ when he was 18. He fell in love with it and moved to Brazil to train, eventually earning his black belt in BJJ under Master Ricardo Liborio.
Instructors.credentials: Adam is also a two-time World Champion in Muay Thai, winning the WPMF World Muay Thai World Championship twice. He is a true martial artist, studying multiple martial arts, including Silat, Kali, Aikido, and Judo. Adam established himself as an early pioneer of MMA and BJJ in Asia, and has fought in ONE Championship with his deep knowledge of different martial disciplines.

Instructors.name: Chatri Sityodtong
Instructors.description: Chatri is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. Inducted into the Black Belt Hall of Fame in 2019, he has over 35 years of martial arts experience as a student, a fighter, a teacher, and a coach. Chatri grew up in Thailand and began his training in Muay Thai at the world-renowned Sityodtong Gym as a young boy. A long-time student of Kru Yodtong Senanan, he has fought professionally in Thailand for the Sityodtong Gym.
Instructors.credentials: Chatri is a certified senior Muay Thai instructor under the legendary Kru Yodtong Senanan of the world-renowned Sityodtong Gym in Thailand. He is also a certified Muay Thai instructor by the World Muay Thai Council (WMC).

Instructors.name: Jovinus Ong
Instructors.description: Jovinus is a WarriorFit Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. Jovinus holds the National Council on Strength & Fitness (NSCF) Personal Training Certificate and a degree in Sport and Exercise Sciences from Edinburgh Napier University. He has over 2 years of experience as a strength and conditioning coach. He is an experienced fitness instructor and is interested in helping others reach their physical fitness goals and to help them get there with proper training and guidance.
Instructors.credentials: Chatri is a certified senior Muay Thai instructor under the legendary Kru Yodtong Senanan of the world-renowned Sityodtong Gym in Thailand. He is also a certified Muay Thai instructor by the World Muay Thai Council (WMC).

Instructors.name: Mikey Musumeci
Instructors.description: Mikey Musumeci is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore on a seasonal basis. He is a highly decorated Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu martial artist, having won five times World Championships as a colored belt. He holds the unique distinction of being the first American to win the IBJJF World Championship in the male black belt division twice. He has a modern style of grappling, utilizing the berimbolo and crab ride positions heavily.

Yoga.name: Butterfly Pose (Baddha Konasana)
Yoga.description: Sometimes also called the cobbler’s pose, this simple stretch involves sitting with legs spread like the wings of the butterfly. Wrap the hands around the feet and straighten the back to feel a stretch in the arms, back, and shoulders.
Yoga.benefits: stimulating blood circulation to relieving symptoms of menstruation and menopause.

Yoga.name: Mountain Pose (Tadasana): Improves Posture
Yoga.description: Mountain pose might seem too simple to have any real benefits. After all, all you have to do is stand there, right? Actually, tadasana can have a very empowering effect. You can achieve the pose by standing tall with legs slightly apart. Hands can hang alongside the body or lift up straight above the head. To get the full effect of the pose, engage the belly and keep thigh muscles firm.

Yoga.name: Yoga Squat Pose (Malasana)
Yoga.description: If you’ve ever been to East Asia, you may recognize what’s known as the “Asian squat”. Yoga also incorporates this pose which has loads of health benefits. You can enter malasana by standing with feet parallel, slightly wider than the hips. Then bend knees and slowly lower down the pelvis until the hips go lower than the knees. Keep the back straight and take arms in front in a prayer position.
benefits: releases tension in the hips and knees.

Yoga.name: Cat Cow Pose (Marjaiasana/Bitilasana)
Yoga.description: Start by positioning the body on all fours on the mat with knees aligned underneath the hips and hands below the shoulders. Next, arch the back with the head and tailbone lifted upwards and chest open. On the next breath, flow into the cow pose by arching the back upwards and lowering the head.
benefits: strengthen and stretch the neck, arms, abdomen, and back

Yoga.name: Downward Facing Dog (Adho Mukha Svanasana)
Yoga.description: Quite possibly the most well-known of all the yoga poses, downward facing dog gives a full-body stretch and awakening. Enter the pose from the plank position with palms spread. Next, lift the hips and lengthen the tailbone. Keep arms and legs firm with the head between the upper arms
benefits: benefits the entire body by building stronger hands and wrists and relieving lower back pain
helps reduce symptoms of menstruation and menopause

Yoga.name: Child’s Pose (Balasana): Stretches the Lower Back
Yoga.description: During a tough yoga class, laying back into child’s pose can feel like a huge relief. Even as an easy pose, balasana comes packed with tons of health benefits. Enter the pose by extending the arms forward, spreading the knees apart while keeping the toes touching, and lowering the torso between the thighs.
benefits: stretches the lower back and shoulders

Yoga.name: Corpse Pose (Shavasana): Relaxes and Relieves Stress
Yoga.description: After a difficult yoga class, corpse pose can feel like a huge relief. It might look more like naptime, but actually, shavasana provides the ideal time to clear the mind and meditate. To enter the pose, lie flat on the back with hands by the side and palms facing up.
Yoga.benefits: relaxes the entire body and relieves stress and fatigue.

Yoga.name: Legs Up the Wall Pose (Viparita Karani): Reduces Insomnia
Yoga.description: During a tough yoga class, laying back into child’s pose can feel like a huge relief. Even as an easy pose, balasana comes packed with tons of health benefits. Enter the pose by extending the arms forward, spreading the knees apart while keeping the toes touching, and lowering the torso between the thighs.
benefits: refresh the legs and reproductive organs

YogaInstructors.name: Anna Mendoza
YogaInstructors.description: Anne's journey into the realm of yoga began in 2004 when she stepped into her first Vinyasa Flow class that led to the next three years practicing Bikram. After more searching, she knew she had found the pot of gold as they say, at the end of yoga’s colorful rainbow when she tried Ashtanga yoga. She continued on this fork of the road and did teacher training programs with Tim Miller and John Scott, in addition to learning from all the other luminaries in the yoga world.
YogaInstructors.specialties: ASHTANGA YOGA, VINYASA FLOW, AND YOGA FOR CHILDREN WITH SPECIAL NEEDS

YogaInstructors.name: CHERRY DU
YogaInstructors.description: Cherry Du discovered Sivananda yoga under Bela Lipat in the year 2000. She began her Ashtanga practice a year later. She is a Yoga Ed certified instructor for yoga for kids (K-8) and is certified to teach Ashtanga by Paul Dallaghan of the Centered Yoga Institute.

YogaInstructors.name: CHERRY DU
YogaInstructors.description: Cherry Du discovered Sivananda yoga under Bela Lipat in the year 2000. She began her Ashtanga practice a year later. She is a Yoga Ed certified instructor for yoga for kids (K-8) and is certified to teach Ashtanga by Paul Dallaghan of the Centered Yoga Institute.

YogaInstructors.name: CONNIE PONCE
YogaInstructors.description: Connie Ponce has been practicing Ashtanga Vinyasa yoga since 2000. She began to focus on the Ashtanga system in 2003 and was certified to teach in 2006 by Paul Dallaghan of the Centered Yoga Institute in Thailand. Connie has since deepened her practice by taking advanced courses and workshops with senior teachers O.P. Tiwari on Pranayama and Richard Freeman in Discovering the Primary Series.

YogaInstructors.name: ERIC VILLALUZ
YogaInstructors.description: Eric Villaluz is a veteran of dance being part of the VIP Dancers that has populated television with dance styles that always captured the zeitgeist. He has doubled up as a choreographer and dance coach, making him the ideal teacher for a multi-tiered class with people of varying abilities.

YogaInstructors.name: GIGI POBLADOR
YogaInstructors.description: Gizela ‘Gigi’ Poblador started practicing Ashtanga yoga in 2007. “I didn’t expect my practice to help me cope with life off the mat. But it did!” Soon after she turned the corner and became a serious practitioner. In 2012, she completed a 200-hour teacher training with John Scott. She has also attended workshops with A.G. Mohan, Richard Freeman, David Keil and recently finished an Intermediate Teacher Training with Hart Lazer that focused on a therapeutic approach.

BodyBuilding.details: This is where it all starts: consistent, hard training. From now on, every workout counts, so go at it with a vengeance! As time goes by, your goal should always be striving to use a little more weight, or do a few more reps. You should routinely take sets to failure—not necessarily every set, but the final set of a movement is a no-brainer.

Knowing when to back off—even take a few days off training—can help you progress. You can't drive a car pedal to the metal all the time without blowing a gasket or throwing a rod. Train nonstop at 100 with no plan to dial it back, and you're begging for an injury or sickness.

Many lifters try to add mass by simply adding more isolation movements on top of what they're already doing. But now more than ever, you'll get the most bang for your gym time by doing lots of big compound movements

Doing 8-10 reps per set is a tried and true way to grow. But for more hypertrophy, or when you're an advanced lifter, it's good to mix it up with both heavier sets of 5-8 reps and lighter sets of 12-15 reps. For the quads and calves, push to 20-50 reps occasionally. Different muscle fibers respond differently to changes in load and time under tension.

Once you have a great place to train, your gains will come faster if you have a great person to train with. This person doesn't necessarily have to share your exact goals or be as strong as you are. At the same time, the absolute best partnerships are those that have a touch of friendly rivalry.
If you don't believe you can grow, you won't. Doubting your ability to succeed can prevent you from working out as hard as you can, and from eating as well as you should.

boxingcoaches.name: Nong-O Gaiyanghadao
boxingcoaches.Iprofile: Nong-O Gaiyanghadao, formerly known as Nong-O Sit Or, is considered to be one of the best pound for pound Muay Thai fighters in the world today. Nong-O is known for the incredible speed, power and precision behind all his strikes. Nong-O is a five-division multiple-time World Champion, 4x Lumpinee Muay Thai World Champion, 1x Rajadamnern Muay Thai World Champion, 2x Thailand National Champion, 3x Fighter of the Year, and more. He is also the current and first-ever ONE Bantamweight Muay Thai World Champion. He has fought against fellow legends like Saenchai PKSaenchaiMuayThaiGym, Singdam Kiatmuu9, Petchboonchu F.A.Group, Pakorn Sakyothin, Kongsak Sitboonmee, Sam-A Gaiyanghadao, Sagetdao Petpayathai and many more.
boxingcoaches.Fprofile: Five division Muay Thai World Champion, 1x Rajadamnern Muay Thai World Champion, 2x Thailand National Champion, 3x Fighter of the Year, One of the best pound-for-pound fighters in Muay Thai history, Known for the incredible speed, precision, and power behind his strikes, Regarded as one of the most exciting Muay Thai fighters to ever step into the ring.

boxingcoaches.name: Adam Shahir Kayoom
boxingcoaches.Iprofile: Adam is the Head Coach of the famed EVOLVE Fight Team at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. Adam started training in Judo and Tae Kwon Do as a child, but found BJJ when he was 18. He fell in love with it and moved to Brazil to train, eventually earning his black belt in BJJ under Master Ricardo Liborio. Adam is also a two-time World Champion in Muay Thai, winning the WPMF World Muay Thai World Championship twice. He is a true martial artist, studying multiple martial arts, including Silat, Kali, Aikido, and Judo. Adam established himself as an early pioneer of MMA and BJJ in Asia, and has fought in ONE Championship with his deep knowledge of different martial disciplines.
boxingcoaches.Fprofile: 2x WPMF World Muay Thai World Champion, Holds black belts in Tae Kwon Do, Shorinji Ryu Karate Do and BJJ First Malaysian to be conferred a black belt in BJJ. Trained in multiple martial arts, including Silat, Kali, Muay Thai, and Judo, Pioneer of MMA and BJJ in Asia

boxingcoaches.name: Chatri Sityodtong
boxingcoaches.Iprofile: Chatri is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. Inducted into the Black Belt Hall of Fame in 2019, he has over 35 years of martial arts experience as a student, a fighter, a teacher, and a coach. Chatri grew up in Thailand and began his training in Muay Thai at the world-renowned Sityodtong Gym as a young boy. A long-time student of Kru Yodtong Senanan, he has fought professionally in Thailand for the Sityodtong Gym.
boxingcoaches.Fprofile: 2x WPMF World Muay Thai World Champion

boxingcoaches.name: Demetrious Johnson
boxingcoaches.Iprofile: Demetrious Johnson is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore on a seasonal basis. He is widely regarded as the greatest pound-for-pound mixed martial artist in history. As the UFC Flyweight World Champion, he broke the record for the most number of world title defenses (11) in the UFC. Known for his speed and explosive wrestling, he has landed the most takedowns in UFC flyweight history. Demetrious is a multiple-time Fighter of the Year Award winner.
boxingcoaches.Fprofile: Holds the record for the most UFC World Title defenses (11), Known as the greatest pound-for-pound mixed martial artist in history, Outside of martial arts, Demetrious is an avid video gamer, Known for his quick striking and elusive movement, Second fighter in UFC history to be awarded bonus payments in all four possible categories (Fight, Knockout, Performance, & Submission of the Night awards), 2017 ESPY Awards Fighter of the Year, 2013 Fox Sports Fighter of the Year

boxingcoaches.Iprofile: Rafael is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore on a seasonal basis. He has been a member of the Evolve Fight Team since 2009. Rafael is a UFC Lightweight World Champion with a professional record of 28-11. He has consistently been one of the top MMA fighters in his weight class around the world. In his quest to keep learning and evolving, he splits his time between Evolve MMA and California for training and fight camps. Prior to the UFC, Rafael was Champion of Fury Fighting Championship. Rafael is also well-versed in wrestling, boxing, and Muay Thai. He has also been a Mundials BJJ World Champion. Rafael is a Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu under Aldo Januario. He is also known for his very aggressive striking style and studies Muay Thai under the legendary Evolve Muay Thai Instructor Team.
boxingcoaches.Fprofile: UFC Lightweight World Champion, Fury FC Champion, Brazil’s top lightweight fighter, Favorite techniques: the rear naked choke and armbar, Winner of UFC, Fight of the Night award, Winner of UFC Submission of the Night award

boxingcoaches.name: Shinya Aoki
boxingcoaches.Iprofile: Shinya is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore on a seasonal basis. A Black Belt in both Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and Judo, he is a 4x ONE Championship Lightweight World Champion. He was also the DREAM FC Lightweight World Champion. Shinya is widely regarded as the #1 pound-for-pound MMA fighter in Asia. He brings over 20 years of martial arts experience to Evolve MMA, competing at the highest levels in the world. He is currently the top BJJ Black Belt in Japan, and he has won every major BJJ tournament in Japan. For MMA, Shinya Aoki has won every major title in Japan including Shooto, DEEP, and DREAM. He holds a Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu under the legendary Yuki Nakai, the 1st BJJ Black Belt in Japan under Carlos Gracie Jr.
boxingcoaches.Fprofile: ONE Championship Lightweight World Champion, DREAM Fighting Championship Lightweight World Champion, Asia’s top professional MMA fighter, One of the top on,rapplers in the world, Favorite techniques: the rear naked choke and leg locks, Known for his flying submissions, Considered to be one of the top lightweight MMA fighters in the world

boxingcoaches.name: Angela Lee
boxingcoaches.Iprofile: Angela Lee is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore on a seasonal basis. Angela is the youngest MMA World Champion in history for any major global MMA organization.  She is the current ONE Atomweight World Champion, a 2-time Pankration World Champion and a Wrestling State Champion. She has competed in and won numerous World, National, and Regional martial arts competitions such as the World Pankration Athlima Federation World Championships and FILA World Championships. She also holds a 1st degree Black Belt in Taekwondo and TDS, and a Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu. A rising star of Singaporean-Korean descent, Angela come from a family of impressive martial artists trained by her father who holds Black Belts in three different martial arts disciplines including a 1st Degree Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and a 6th Degree Hapdosool Master Black Belt, and her mother who holds a 5th Degree Hapdosool Master Black Belt.
boxingcoaches.Fprofile: ONE Atomweight World Champion, Professional MMA fighter, 2x Pankration World Champion, Hawaii State Wrestling Champion, Black Belt in Taekwondo and TDS, Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu

boxingcoaches.name: Xiong Jing Nan
boxingcoaches.Iprofile: Xiong Jing Nan is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. She is the ONE Women’s Strawweight World Champion and China’s first-ever mixed martial arts World Champion. Before transitioning to mixed martial arts, she represented China in boxing internationally. Jing Nan is also a China Open BJJ Champion.
boxingcoaches.Fprofile: ONE Women’s Strawweight World Champion, China’s first-ever mixed martial arts World Champion, Represented China in boxing on the international level, China Open BJJ Champion

boxingcoaches.name: Christian Lee
boxingcoaches.Iprofile: Christian Lee is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore on a seasonal basis. Christian is the ONE Lightweight World Champion and the youngest male World Champion in mixed martial arts history. He is also the ONE Lightweight World Grand Prix Champion. Christian is a multiple-time Junior Pankration World Champion with a Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu. He was voted ‘Most Outstanding Athlete’ at the 2013 FILA World Championship after winning five World Titles across the disciplines of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu, Pankration, MMA, and Submission Grappling. He also holds a 1st degree Black Belt in Taekwondo and TDS. Christian holds the record for most finishes in ONE Championship history.
boxingcoaches.Fprofile: ONE Lightweight World Champion, ONE Welterweight World Champion, ONE Lightweight World Grand Prix Champion, Youngest male World Champion in mixed martial,arts history, Multiple-time Junior Pankration World Champion, Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu

boxingcoaches.name: Hiroki Akimoto
boxingcoaches.Iprofile: Hiroki Akimoto is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. He is a WFKO Kyokushin Karate World Champion, WBC Muay Thai Japan Champion, Japan Kickboxing Federation Champion, and more. Known for his crisp technique and explosive power, he holds a Kyokushin Karate Black Belt.
boxingcoaches.Fprofile: ONE Bantamweight Kickboxing World Champion, WFKO Kyokushin Karate World Champion, WBC Muay Thai Japan Champion, Japan Kickboxing Federation Champion,Kyokushin Karate Black Belt, Known for his crisp technique and powerful roundhouse kick, Started karate at the age of 8 to defend himself from bullies

boxingcoaches.name: Petchboonchu FA Group
boxingcoaches.Iprofile: Petchboonchu is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. With 14 titles under his belt, Petchboonchu is the most decorated Muay Thai World Champion in history. Petchboonchu is a five-division multiple-time World Champion, multiple time Muay Thai Lumpinee World Champion, Rajadamnern Muay Thai World Champion, WMC Muay Thai World Champion, Thailand Muay Thai World Champion, and more. He has fought against the legendary Saenchai PKSaenchaimuaythaigym and won thrice. Petchboonchu is regarded as one of the greatest clinch fighters of all time.
boxingcoaches.Fprofile: One of the greatest clinch fighters of all time, Most decorated Muay Thai fighter in history, Won the original Lumpinee stadium’s last main event, Fought against the legendary Saenchai PKSaenchaimuaythaigym and won thrice

boxingcoaches.name: Roger Gracie
boxingcoaches.Iprofile: Roger Gracie is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore on a seasonal basis. He is regarded as one of the greatest Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu legends of all time and is the first person to win 10 Mundials World Championships in the Black Belt Division. He is the grandson of Carlos Gracie, the founder of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu.
boxingcoaches.Fprofile: 3rd degree Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu under Carlos Gracie Jr., 10 x Mundials BJJ World Champion, Has submitted all his opponents in the Mundials, ONE Light Heavyweight World Champion, 2 x ADCC World Champion

boxingcoaches.name: Marcus Almeida
boxingcoaches.Iprofile: Marcus “Buchecha” Almeida is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore on a seasonal basis. Known for his athleticism and technical mastery, he is the most decorated Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu World Champion in history, having won 13 BJJ World Championships.
boxingcoaches.Fprofile: Most decorated competitor in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu history, 13x BJJ world Champion, 2 x ADCC World Champion

boxingcoaches.name: Mikey Musumeci
boxingcoaches.Iprofile: Mikey Musumeci is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore on a seasonal basis. He is a highly decorated Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu martial artist, having won five times World Championships as a colored belt. He holds the unique distinction of being the first American to win the IBJJF World Championship in the male black belt division twice. He has a modern style of grappling, utilizing the berimbolo and crab ride positions heavily.
boxingcoaches.Fprofile: Multiple-time IBJJF World Champion, Won sequential IBJJF World Championships as a colored belt, First American to win the IBJJF World Championship in the male black belt division twice

boxingcoaches.name: Garry Tonon
boxingcoaches.Iprofile: Garry Tonon is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore on a seasonal basis. He is widely regarded as one of the best submission grapplers on the planet today. With a dynamic and exciting style, Garry is known for his fearless approach and is one of the world’s foremost leg lock experts.  Garry is currently a professional MMA fighter in ONE Championship and a member of the prestigious Evolve Fight Team.
boxingcoaches.Fprofile: 3-time Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu World Champion, 5-time Eddie Bravo Invitational Champion

boxingcoaches.name: Dejdamrong Sor Amnuaysirichok
boxingcoaches.Iprofile: Dejdamrong is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. He is a ONE Strawweight World Champion and a 3x Lumpinee Muay Thai World Champion with a professional Muay Thai record of 282-65. Kru Rong is also a Thailand National Champion and Omnoi Stadium Champion. Dejdamrong is known as a technical fighter with quick hands and lightning feet. He has some of the most unique and creative striking combinations in the sport of Muay Thai. Dejdamrong is a certified Muay Thai instructor from Thailand who brings over 25 years of competitive experience to Evolve MMA.
boxingcoaches.Fprofile: ONE Strawweight World Champion, Muay Thai World Champion, 3x Lumpinee World Champion, Thailand National Champion, Omnoi Champion, Shell Rimula Tournament Champion, Channel 3 Muay Thai Champion, Professional MMA fighter for ONE Championship

boxingcoaches.name: Leandro Thomas Issa da Silva
boxingcoaches.Iprofile: Leandro Thomas Issa da Silva is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. He is a Mundials World Champion in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu with over 20 years of experience. He has won numerous regional and national titles in Brazil. He is currently a professional MMA fighter with a 17-7 record competing in the ONE Championship. Leandro is a 3rd degree Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu. He trained under Roberto “Gordo” Correa at Evolve Brazil before moving to Evolve Singapore to live and teach on a permanent basis. Leandro has also competed in MMA events such as the UFC, Art of War, Martial Combat FC, and Jungle Fight. Since arriving at Evolve MMA, Leandro has worked closely with the Evolve Muay Thai World Champions to improve his striking. Leandro’s favorite BJJ techniques include the armbar, rear naked choke, omoplata, and flying triangle choke.
boxingcoaches.Fprofile: ONE Championship Fighter, Mundials World Champion in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu, Winner of UFC Fight of the Night and UFC Submission of the Night awards, Martial Combat FC Featherweight Super Fight Champion, Professional MMA fighter, Favorite techniques: armbar, rear naked choke, omoplata, flying triangle choke

boxingcoaches.name: Sagetdao Petpayathai
boxingcoaches.Iprofile: Sagetdao Petpayathai is a multiple-time Muay Thai World Champion, winning every major title in Muay Thai today. A big Muay Thai Superstar and Legend, he is a 4x Lumpinee World Champion, 1x Rajdamnern World Champion, 2x MAX Muay Thai World Champion, 1x WBC Muay Thai World Champion, 1x WPMF World Champion, etc. Sagetdao has beaten some of the biggest names in Muay Thai such as Saenchai PKSaenchaimuaythaigym, Petchboonchu FA Group, Singdam Kiatmuu9, Nong-O Gaiyanghadao, Anuwat Kaewsamrit, Nongbee Kiatyongyuth, and many others. He has a professional fight record of 162 wins and 62 losses.
boxingcoaches.Fprofile: One of the greatest Muay Thai World Champions in history, Multiple-time Muay Thai World Champion, Defeated some of the biggest names in history, Held every major Muay Thai world title, Voted as one of the greatest fighters in the history of Muay Thai, Regarded as one of the most complete fighters in Muay Thai history

boxingcoaches.name: Daorung Sityodtong
boxingcoaches.Iprofile: Daorung is an Instructor of Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. He is a former Muay Thai Champion in Thailand. He brings over 48 years of professional Muay Thai experience as a professional fighter and as a trainer of Lumpinee Muay Thai World Champions. He has fought in over 100 professional Muay Thai fights. His knowledge of the fight game is unsurpassed. He has been at the Sityodtong Camp for most of his career as a fighter and elite trainer. Daorung is known for his strong low leg kicks and big right hand. Although he is ring-proven, Daorung is also a street fighter with hundreds of street fights to his name.
boxingcoaches.Fprofile: Multiple-time Muay Thai World Champion

boxingcoaches.name: Nontachai, Sit-O
boxingcoaches.Iprofile: Nontachai is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. He is a 3x Lumpinee Muay Thai World Champion, 1x Rajdamnern World Champion, and a Thailand Champion. As one of the top World Champions in Thailand, Nontachai has the distinction of fighting and beating many Muay Thai legends. In his elite career, he has won 7 championship title belts at the highest levels of Muay Thai in Thailand. The Thai media has labeled him as one of the most dominant fighters in Muay Thai due to his aggressive style.
boxingcoaches.Fprofile: Nontachai has competed around the world including Finland, Italy, France, and Holland. According to the Evolve Muay Thai instructors, Nontachai is one of the best football players on the team. Nontachai names his toughest opponents as fellow instructors Namsaknoi and Orono.

boxingcoaches.name: Kaoklai Kaennorsing
boxingcoaches.Iprofile: Kaoklai Kaennorsing is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. He is a 2x Rajadamnern Muay Thai World Champion, WBC Muay Thai World Champion, K-1 World Grand Prix Champion, and more. Fighting since the age of 8, Kaoklai has over 200 professional Muay Thai fights. Known for his well-rounded style and often competing against much larger opponents, he has fought some of the greatest Muay Thai and kickboxing legends such as Lamsongkram Chuwattana, Ray Sefo, Alexey Ignashov, and Francois Botha, among others. His favorite techniques are his roundhouse kick and push kick.
boxingcoaches.Fprofile: 2x Rajadamnern Muay Thai World Champion, WBC Muay Thai World Champion, K-1 World Grand Prix Champion, Known for his ability to pull off stunning knockouts, Known for often fighting much larger opponents, Competed in over 200 professional Muay Thai fights

BJJcoaches.name: Garry Tonon
BJJcoaches.Iprofile: Garry Tonon is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore on a seasonal basis. He is widely regarded as one of the best submission grapplers on the planet today. With a dynamic and exciting style, Garry is known for his fearless approach and is one of the world’s foremost leg lock experts. He is a 3-time Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu World Champion, a 5-time Eddie Bravo Invitational Champion, and a Pan American Champion. Garry is currently a professional MMA fighter in ONE Championship and a member of the prestigious Evolve Fight Team.
BJJcoaches.Fprofile: Garry is a Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu under Tom DeBlass. His favorite BJJ techniques include the heel hook and the rear naked choke.

BJJcoaches.name: Rafael Correa de Lima
BJJcoaches.Iprofile: Rafael is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts on a seasonal basis. He is a Mundials BJJ Black Belt World Champion, and he is responsible for the course curriculum of the Renzo Gracie Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu Program at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts. He brings over 25 years of experience in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu. Rafael grew up in Brazil training side by side with the Gracie family. He has been a close friend of Renzo Gracie’s for over 30 years. Rafael has fought in hundreds of BJJ fights. He was the winner of the 1998 Mundials World Championships in the Black Belt Division. He is also a 5 time National Champion of Brazil where he was voted the most technical fighter and had the fastest submission (12 seconds). He is also a runner-up in ADCC Brazil. He has competed and won in numerous other tournaments around the world.
BJJcoaches.Fprofile: Mundials BJJ Black Belt World Champion with 30 years of experience, 5 time National Champion of Brazil, Runner-up in ADCC, Winner of fastest submission (12 seconds) at World Championships

BJJcoaches.name: Alex Silva
BJJcoaches.Iprofile: Alex is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. He is a ONE Strawweight World Champion and a Copa do Mundo World Champion in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu with over 20 years of experience. He has won numerous regional and national titles in Brazil. Alex’s favorite BJJ techniques include the armbar and rear naked choke.
BJJcoaches.Fprofile: Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu World Champion, Winner of numerous regional and national titles, Deep experience in BJJ, Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu Black Belt, Former ONE Strawweight World Champion

BJJcoaches.name: Gamal Hassan
BJJcoaches.Iprofile: Gamal Hassan is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. He is a Brazil Nationals Champion in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu with over 15 years of experience. He is the winner of numerous regional and national competitions in Brazil. Gamal’s favorite techniques are the armbar and the choke
BJJcoaches.Fprofile: Gamal holds a Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu under Checkmat.

BJJcoaches.name: Teco Shinzato
BJJcoaches.Iprofile: Teco Shinzato is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. He is a 2x Black Belt Mundials World Champion in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu with over 30 years of experience. He is the winner of numerous regional and national competitions in Brazil. Teco’s favorite techniques are the rear naked choke and arm bar
BJJcoaches.Fprofile: Teco holds a 4th degree Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu under the legendary Elcio Figueiredo.

BJJcoaches.name: Valdir Rodrigues
BJJcoaches.Iprofile: Valdir Rodrigues is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. He is a Mundials World Championship Bronze Medalist with over 20 years of experience. He is also a Brazil Nationals Champion, a Pan American Champion, and a South American Champion. Valdir’s favorite position is the half guard.
BJJcoaches.Fprofile: Valdir holds a 2nd degree Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu under Erivaldo Junior from Liga Jiu-Jitsu.

BJJcoaches.name: Fabio Da Mata
BJJcoaches.Iprofile: Fabio Da Mata is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. He is a Mundials World Championship Bronze Medalist with over 15 years of experience. He is also a 2x Brazil Nationals Champion and a 3x Sao Paulo State Champion. Fabio’s favorite position is the half guard and his favorite technique is the arm triangle.
BJJcoaches.Fprofile: Fabio holds a Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu under Erivaldo Junior from Liga Jiu-Jitsu.

BJJcoaches.name: Rodrigo Marello
BJJcoaches.Iprofile: Rodrigo Marello is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. He is a No-Gi Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu World Champion, Pan American Champion, and South American Champion with over 10 years of experience. Rodrigo’s favorite position is closed guard, and his favorite submission is the straight foot lock.
BJJcoaches.Fprofile: Rodrigo holds a Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu. His mother, who was his first instructor, also holds a Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu.

BJJcoaches.name: Thales Nakassu
BJJcoaches.Iprofile: Thales Nakassu is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. He is a South American Champion, 3x South Brazilian Champion, and Sao Paulo State Champion with over 15 years of experience. He is also a professional MMA fighter with a 5-1 record. Thales’ favorite submissions are the triangle choke and D’Arce choke. He has a Bachelor’s Degree in Physical Education.

BJJcoaches.name: Alex Silva
BJJcoaches.Iprofile: Alex is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. He is a ONE Strawweight World Champion and a Copa do Mundo World Champion in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu with over 20 years of experience. He has won numerous regional and national titles in Brazil. Alex’s favorite BJJ techniques include the armbar and rear naked choke.
BJJcoaches.Fprofile: Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu World Champion, Winner of numerous regional and national titles, Deep experience in BJJ, Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu Black Belt, Former ONE Strawweight World Champion

BJJcoaches.name: Ongree Sor Dechapant
BJJcoaches.Iprofile: Ongree Sor Dechapant is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. He is a Lumpinee Muay Thai World Champion, Rajadamnern Muay Thai World Champion, Channel 7 Muay Thai Champion, and more. Known for his direct, clinch-heavy style, he has fought some of the greatest Muay Thai legends, such as Panpayak Jitmuangnon, Puenkon Tor Surat, and Rungnarai Kiatmookao, among others. His favorite techniques are his knees from the clinch. Fighting since the age of 10, he has over 300 professional Muay Thai fights.
BJJcoaches.Fprofile: Lumpinee Muay Thai World Champion, Rajadamnern Muay Thai World Champion, Channel 7 Muay Thai Champion

BJJcoaches.name: Chaowalit Jocky Gym
BJJcoaches.Iprofile: Chaowalit is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. He is a 3 time Muay Thai World Champion. He is a Rajdamnern Stadium World Champion, Thailand National Champion, and WMC World Champion. He is an elite professional fighter with a fight record of 172-34. With over 21 years of professional fighting experience at Rajdamnern Stadium, Lumpinee Stadium and other stadiums around the world, his style is a ferocious blend of beautiful kicks and elbows. His favorite techniques are the cartwheel kick, the high roundhouse kick, and the flying push kick.
BJJcoaches.Fprofile: 3 time Muay Thai World Champion Won championships at Rajdamnern Stadium, Thailand Nationals, and WMC. Favorite techniques: cartwheel kick, high roundhouse kick, and flying push kick

BJJcoaches.name: Kwankhao Mor. Rattanabandit
BJJcoaches.Iprofile: Kwankhao is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. He is a Rajadamnern Stadium Super Featherweight Muay Thai World Champion, Thailand National Super Featherweight Muay Thai Champion, and Toyota Marathon Tournament Champion. As one of the top World Champions in Thailand, Kwankhao has the distinction of fighting Muay Thai legends such as Sam-A Gaiyanghadao, Petchmorakot Petchyindee, Muangthai PK Saenchaimuaythaigym, and Phetpanomrung Mor. Rattanabandit.
BJJcoaches.Fprofile: Thailand National Super Featherweight Muay Thai Champion Rajadamnern Stadium Super Featherweight Muay Thai World Champion, Toyota Marathon Tournament Champion Fought some of the biggest names of his era. Regarded as one of the most technical fighters in Muay Thai today

BJJcoaches.name: Danielle Kelly
BJJcoaches.Iprofile: Danielle is a seasonal Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. She is a BJJ black belt under Karel “Silver Fox” Parel. At just 26 years old, Kelly has competed and won against some of the best grapplers in the world, including beating multiple-time IBJJF World Champion Sofia Amarante via rear-naked choke. Kelly is also preparing to make her MMA debut as she hones her striking prowess. Danielle is from Philadelphia, USA.
BJJcoaches.Fprofile: Veteran BJJ competitor in numerous fight promotions, including WNO, EBI, ADCC Trials, and UFC Fight Pass Invitational Wins against veterans such as Carla Esparza, Roxanne Modafferi, and Cynthia Calvillo, Rising star in the international grappling scene Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu ONE Championship Superstar

BJJcoaches.name: Bruno Pucci
BJJcoaches.Iprofile: Bruno Pucci is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. He is a 2 time Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu No-Gi World Champion with over 10 years of experience. He has won numerous regional and national titles in Brazil. He is also a professional MMA fighter with a 7-4 record. He currently competes in ONE Championship, Asia’s largest and most prestigious MMA event. His favorite move is the rear naked choke. In his competitive career, Bruno has utilized many variations of the choke to submit his opponents.
BJJcoaches.Fprofile: ONE Championship Superstar Featherweight Contender, World Champion in No-Gi Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu, Professional MMA fighter, Favorite techniques: the armbar and rear naked choke

BJJcoaches.name: Nontachai, Sit-O
BJJcoaches.Iprofile: Nontachai is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. He is a 3x Lumpinee Muay Thai World Champion, 1x Rajdamnern World Champion, and a Thailand Champion. As one of the top World Champions in Thailand, Nontachai has the distinction of fighting and beating many Muay Thai legends. In his elite career, he has won 7 championship title belts at the highest levels of Muay Thai in Thailand. The Thai media has labeled him as one of the most dominant fighters in Muay Thai due to his aggressive style.
BJJcoaches.Fprofile: Nontachai has competed around the world including Finland, Italy, France, and Holland. According to the Evolve Muay Thai instructors, Nontachai is one of the best football players on the team. Nontachai names his toughest opponents as fellow instructors Namsaknoi and Orono.

BJJcoaches.name: Petchboonchu FA Group
BJJcoaches.Iprofile: Petchboonchu is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. With 14 titles under his belt, Petchboonchu is the most decorated Muay Thai World Champion in history. Petchboonchu is a five-division multiple-time World Champion, multiple time Muay Thai Lumpinee World Champion, Rajadamnern Muay Thai World Champion, WMC Muay Thai World Champion, Thailand Muay Thai World Champion, and more. He has fought against the legendary Saenchai PKSaenchaimuaythaigym and won thrice. Petchboonchu is regarded as one of the greatest clinch fighters of all time.
BJJcoaches.Fprofile: One of the greatest clinch fighters of all time, Most decorated Muay Thai fighter in history, Won the original Lumpinee stadium’s last main event, Fought against the legendary Saenchai PKSaenchaimuaythaigym and won thrice

BJJcoaches.name: Shinya Aoki
BJJcoaches.Iprofile: Shinya is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore on a seasonal basis. A Black Belt in both Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and Judo, he is a 4x ONE Championship Lightweight World Champion. He was also the DREAM FC Lightweight World Champion. Shinya is widely regarded as the #1 pound-for-pound MMA fighter in Asia. He brings over 20 years of martial arts experience to Evolve MMA, competing at the highest levels in the world. He is currently the top BJJ Black Belt in Japan, and he has won every major BJJ tournament in Japan. For MMA, Shinya Aoki has won every major title in Japan including Shooto, DEEP, and DREAM. He holds a Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu under the legendary Yuki Nakai, the 1st BJJ Black Belt in Japan under Carlos Gracie Jr.
BJJcoaches.Fprofile: ONE Championship Lightweight World Champion, DREAM Fighting Championship Lightweight World Champion, Asia’s top professional MMA fighter, One of the top on,rapplers in the world, Favorite techniques: the rear naked choke and leg locks, Known for his flying submissions, Considered to be one of the top lightweight MMA fighters in the world

BJJcoaches.name: Daorung Sityodtong
BJJcoaches.Iprofile: Daorung is an Instructor of Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. He is a former Muay Thai Champion in Thailand. He brings over 48 years of professional Muay Thai experience as a professional fighter and as a trainer of Lumpinee Muay Thai World Champions. He has fought in over 100 professional Muay Thai fights. His knowledge of the fight game is unsurpassed. He has been at the Sityodtong Camp for most of his career as a fighter and elite trainer. Daorung is known for his strong low leg kicks and big right hand. Although he is ring-proven, Daorung is also a street fighter with hundreds of street fights to his name.

BJJcoaches.name: Marcus Almeida
BJJcoaches.Iprofile: Marcus “Buchecha” Almeida is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore on a seasonal basis. Known for his athleticism and technical mastery, he is the most decorated Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu World Champion in history, having won 13 BJJ World Championships.
BJJcoaches.Fprofile: Most decorated competitor in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu history, 13x BJJ world Champion, 2 x ADCC World Champion

muayThai.name: Rodlek PK.Saenchai Muaythaigym
muayThai.Iprofile: Rodlek PK Saenchaigym is an Instructor at Evolve MMA in Singapore. He is a WMC and Channel 7 Stadium Muay Thai World Champion. Fighting since the age of 10, Rodlek has faced Muay Thai legends including Nong-O Gaiyanghadao, Panpayak Jitmuangnon and Rodtang Jitmuangnon. He employs a fighting style that utilizes heavy punches and powerful low kicks.
muayThai.Fprofile: Multiple-time Muay Thai World Champion in two weight divisions Faced many Muay Thai legends including Rodtang Jitmuangnon and Panpayak Jitmuangnon Professional fight record of 177-43-5

muayThai.name: Dejdamrong Sor Amnuaysirichok
muayThai.Iprofile: Dejdamrong is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. He is a ONE Strawweight World Champion and a 3x Lumpinee Muay Thai World Champion with a professional Muay Thai record of 282-65. Kru Rong is also a Thailand National Champion and Omnoi Stadium Champion. Dejdamrong is known as a technical fighter with quick hands and lightning feet. He has some of the most unique and creative striking combinations in the sport of Muay Thai. Dejdamrong is a certified Muay Thai instructor from Thailand who brings over 25 years of competitive experience to Evolve MMA.

muayThai.Iprofile: Nontachai is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. He is a 3x Lumpinee Muay Thai World Champion, 1x Rajdamnern World Champion, and a Thailand Champion. As one of the top World Champions in Thailand, Nontachai has the distinction of fighting and beating many Muay Thai legends. In his elite career, he has won 7 championship title belts at the highest levels of Muay Thai in Thailand. The Thai media has labeled him as one of the most dominant fighters in Muay Thai due to his aggressive style.
muayThai.Fprofile: Nontachai has competed around the world including Finland, Italy, France, and Holland. According to the Evolve Muay Thai instructors, Nontachai is one of the best football players on the team. Nontachai names his toughest opponents as fellow instructors Namsaknoi and Orono.

muayThai.name: Angela Lee
muayThai.Iprofile: Angela Lee is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore on a seasonal basis. Angela is the youngest MMA World Champion in history for any major global MMA organization.  She is the current ONE Atomweight World Champion, a 2-time Pankration World Champion and a Wrestling State Champion. She has competed in and won numerous World, National, and Regional martial arts competitions such as the World Pankration Athlima Federation World Championships and FILA World Championships. She also holds a 1st degree Black Belt in Taekwondo and TDS, and a Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu. A rising star of Singaporean-Korean descent, Angela come from a family of impressive martial artists trained by her father who holds Black Belts in three different martial arts disciplines including a 1st Degree Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and a 6th Degree Hapdosool Master Black Belt, and her mother who holds a 5th Degree Hapdosool Master Black Belt.
muayThai.Fprofile: ONE Atomweight World Champion, Professional MMA fighter, 2x Pankration World Champion, Hawaii State Wrestling Champion, Black Belt in Taekwondo and TDS, Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu

muayThai.name: Xiong Jing Nan
muayThai.Iprofile: Xiong Jing Nan is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. She is the ONE Women’s Strawweight World Champion and China’s first-ever mixed martial arts World Champion. Before transitioning to mixed martial arts, she represented China in boxing internationally. Jing Nan is also a China Open BJJ Champion.
muayThai.Fprofile: ONE Women’s Strawweight World Champion, China’s first-ever mixed martial arts World Champion, Represented China in boxing on the international level, China Open BJJ Champion

muayThai.name: Christian Lee
muayThai.Iprofile: Christian Lee is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore on a seasonal basis. Christian is the ONE Lightweight World Champion and the youngest male World Champion in mixed martial arts history. He is also the ONE Lightweight World Grand Prix Champion. Christian is a multiple-time Junior Pankration World Champion with a Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu. He was voted ‘Most Outstanding Athlete’ at the 2013 FILA World Championship after winning five World Titles across the disciplines of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu, Pankration, MMA, and Submission Grappling. He also holds a 1st degree Black Belt in Taekwondo and TDS. Christian holds the record for most finishes in ONE Championship history.
muayThai.Fprofile: ONE Lightweight World Champion, ONE Welterweight World Champion, ONE Lightweight World Grand Prix Champion, Youngest male World Champion in mixed martial,arts history, Multiple-time Junior Pankration World Champion, Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu

muayThai.name: Hiroki Akimoto
muayThai.Iprofile: Hiroki Akimoto is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. He is a WFKO Kyokushin Karate World Champion, WBC Muay Thai Japan Champion, Japan Kickboxing Federation Champion, and more. Known for his crisp technique and explosive power, he holds a Kyokushin Karate Black Belt.
muayThai.Fprofile: ONE Bantamweight Kickboxing World Champion, WFKO Kyokushin Karate World Champion, WBC Muay Thai Japan Champion, Japan Kickboxing Federation Champion,Kyokushin Karate Black Belt, Known for his crisp technique and powerful roundhouse kick, Started karate at the age of 8 to defend himself from bullies

MMA.name: Nong-O Gaiyanghadao
MMA.Iprofile: Nong-O Gaiyanghadao, formerly known as Nong-O Sit Or, is considered to be one of the best pound for pound Muay Thai fighters in the world today. Nong-O is known for the incredible speed, power and precision behind all his strikes. Nong-O is a five-division multiple-time World Champion, 4x Lumpinee Muay Thai World Champion, 1x Rajadamnern Muay Thai World Champion, 2x Thailand National Champion, 3x Fighter of the Year, and more. He is also the current and first-ever ONE Bantamweight Muay Thai World Champion. He has fought against fellow legends like Saenchai PKSaenchaiMuayThaiGym, Singdam Kiatmuu9, Petchboonchu F.A.Group, Pakorn Sakyothin, Kongsak Sitboonmee, Sam-A Gaiyanghadao, Sagetdao Petpayathai and many more.
MMA.Fprofile: Five division Muay Thai World Champion, 1x Rajadamnern Muay Thai World Champion, 2x Thailand National Champion, 3x Fighter of the Year, One of the best pound-for-pound fighters in Muay Thai history, Known for the incredible speed, precision, and power behind his strikes, Regarded as one of the most exciting Muay Thai fighters to ever step into the ring.

MMA.name: Adam Shahir Kayoom
MMA.Iprofile: Adam is the Head Coach of the famed EVOLVE Fight Team at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. Adam started training in Judo and Tae Kwon Do as a child, but found BJJ when he was 18. He fell in love with it and moved to Brazil to train, eventually earning his black belt in BJJ under Master Ricardo Liborio. Adam is also a two-time World Champion in Muay Thai, winning the WPMF World Muay Thai World Championship twice. He is a true martial artist, studying multiple martial arts, including Silat, Kali, Aikido, and Judo. Adam established himself as an early pioneer of MMA and BJJ in Asia, and has fought in ONE Championship with his deep knowledge of different martial disciplines.
MMA.Fprofile: 2x WPMF World Muay Thai World Champion, Holds black belts in Tae Kwon Do, Shorinji Ryu Karate Do and BJJ First Malaysian to be conferred a black belt in BJJ. Trained in multiple martial arts, including Silat, Kali, Muay Thai, and Judo, Pioneer of MMA and BJJ in Asia

MMA.name: Chatri Sityodtong
MMA.Iprofile: Chatri is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. Inducted into the Black Belt Hall of Fame in 2019, he has over 35 years of martial arts experience as a student, a fighter, a teacher, and a coach. Chatri grew up in Thailand and began his training in Muay Thai at the world-renowned Sityodtong Gym as a young boy. A long-time student of Kru Yodtong Senanan, he has fought professionally in Thailand for the Sityodtong Gym.
MMA.Fprofile: 2x WPMF World Muay Thai World Champion

MMA.name: Demetrious Johnson
MMA.Iprofile: Demetrious Johnson is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore on a seasonal basis. He is widely regarded as the greatest pound-for-pound mixed martial artist in history. As the UFC Flyweight World Champion, he broke the record for the most number of world title defenses (11) in the UFC. Known for his speed and explosive wrestling, he has landed the most takedowns in UFC flyweight history. Demetrious is a multiple-time Fighter of the Year Award winner.
MMA.Fprofile: Holds the record for the most UFC World Title defenses (11), Known as the greatest pound-for-pound mixed martial artist in history, Outside of martial arts, Demetrious is an avid video gamer, Known for his quick striking and elusive movement, Second fighter in UFC history to be awarded bonus payments in all four possible categories (Fight, Knockout, Performance, & Submission of the Night awards), 2017 ESPY Awards Fighter of the Year, 2013 Fox Sports Fighter of the Year

MMA.Iprofile: Rafael is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore on a seasonal basis. He has been a member of the Evolve Fight Team since 2009. Rafael is a UFC Lightweight World Champion with a professional record of 28-11. He has consistently been one of the top MMA fighters in his weight class around the world. In his quest to keep learning and evolving, he splits his time between Evolve MMA and California for training and fight camps. Prior to the UFC, Rafael was Champion of Fury Fighting Championship. Rafael is also well-versed in wrestling, boxing, and Muay Thai. He has also been a Mundials BJJ World Champion. Rafael is a Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu under Aldo Januario. He is also known for his very aggressive striking style and studies Muay Thai under the legendary Evolve Muay Thai Instructor Team.
MMA.Fprofile: UFC Lightweight World Champion, Fury FC Champion, Brazil’s top lightweight fighter, Favorite techniques: the rear naked choke and armbar, Winner of UFC, Fight of the Night award, Winner of UFC Submission of the Night award

MMA.name: Shinya Aoki
MMA.Iprofile: Shinya is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore on a seasonal basis. A Black Belt in both Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and Judo, he is a 4x ONE Championship Lightweight World Champion. He was also the DREAM FC Lightweight World Champion. Shinya is widely regarded as the #1 pound-for-pound MMA fighter in Asia. He brings over 20 years of martial arts experience to Evolve MMA, competing at the highest levels in the world. He is currently the top BJJ Black Belt in Japan, and he has won every major BJJ tournament in Japan. For MMA, Shinya Aoki has won every major title in Japan including Shooto, DEEP, and DREAM. He holds a Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu under the legendary Yuki Nakai, the 1st BJJ Black Belt in Japan under Carlos Gracie Jr.
MMA.Fprofile: ONE Championship Lightweight World Champion, DREAM Fighting Championship Lightweight World Champion, Asia’s top professional MMA fighter, One of the top on,rapplers in the world, Favorite techniques: the rear naked choke and leg locks, Known for his flying submissions, Considered to be one of the top lightweight MMA fighters in the world

MMA.name: Angela Lee
MMA.Iprofile: Angela Lee is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore on a seasonal basis. Angela is the youngest MMA World Champion in history for any major global MMA organization.  She is the current ONE Atomweight World Champion, a 2-time Pankration World Champion and a Wrestling State Champion. She has competed in and won numerous World, National, and Regional martial arts competitions such as the World Pankration Athlima Federation World Championships and FILA World Championships. She also holds a 1st degree Black Belt in Taekwondo and TDS, and a Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu. A rising star of Singaporean-Korean descent, Angela come from a family of impressive martial artists trained by her father who holds Black Belts in three different martial arts disciplines including a 1st Degree Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and a 6th Degree Hapdosool Master Black Belt, and her mother who holds a 5th Degree Hapdosool Master Black Belt.
MMA.Fprofile: ONE Atomweight World Champion, Professional MMA fighter, 2x Pankration World Champion, Hawaii State Wrestling Champion, Black Belt in Taekwondo and TDS, Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu

MMA.name: Xiong Jing Nan
MMA.Iprofile: Xiong Jing Nan is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. She is the ONE Women’s Strawweight World Champion and China’s first-ever mixed martial arts World Champion. Before transitioning to mixed martial arts, she represented China in boxing internationally. Jing Nan is also a China Open BJJ Champion.
MMA.Fprofile: ONE Women’s Strawweight World Champion, China’s first-ever mixed martial arts World Champion, Represented China in boxing on the international level, China Open BJJ Champion

MMA.name: Christian Lee
MMA.Iprofile: Christian Lee is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore on a seasonal basis. Christian is the ONE Lightweight World Champion and the youngest male World Champion in mixed martial arts history. He is also the ONE Lightweight World Grand Prix Champion. Christian is a multiple-time Junior Pankration World Champion with a Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu. He was voted ‘Most Outstanding Athlete’ at the 2013 FILA World Championship after winning five World Titles across the disciplines of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu, Pankration, MMA, and Submission Grappling. He also holds a 1st degree Black Belt in Taekwondo and TDS. Christian holds the record for most finishes in ONE Championship history.
MMA.Fprofile: ONE Lightweight World Champion, ONE Welterweight World Champion, ONE Lightweight World Grand Prix Champion, Youngest male World Champion in mixed martial,arts history, Multiple-time Junior Pankration World Champion, Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu

MMA.name: Hiroki Akimoto
MMA.Iprofile: Hiroki Akimoto is an Instructor at Evolve Mixed Martial Arts in Singapore. He is a WFKO Kyokushin Karate World Champion, WBC Muay Thai Japan Champion, Japan Kickboxing Federation Champion, and more. Known for his crisp technique and explosive power, he holds a Kyokushin Karate Black Belt.
MMA.Fprofile: ONE Bantamweight Kickboxing World Champion, WFKO Kyokushin Karate World Champion, WBC Muay Thai Japan Champion, Japan Kickboxing Federation Champion,Kyokushin Karate Black Belt, Known for his crisp technique and powerful roundhouse kick, Started karate at the age of 8 to defend himself from bullies

classes.name: Muay Thai
classes.description1: Muay Thai (Thai boxing) is a martial art and combat sport, which dates back to the 13th century. Known as the “science of 8 limbs, it incorporates strikes using the fists, knees, shins and elbow as well as an element of grappling.
classes.description2: With its roots in Thailand’s military, It is now trained across the world and numerous organisations broadcast Muay Thai ring fighting events to millions of fans globally. It’s also a key component of MMA styles such as the fighting you would see in UFC or Bellator bouts.
classes.description3: This guide will tell you everything you need to know about Muay Thai, from the strikes used, training methods, famous fighters, history and modern day developments.

classes.name: Mixed Martial Arts
classes.description1: Mixed martial arts originated as mixed combat sports in Ancient China and Ancient Greece. The Chinese combat sport of Leitai is one of the first mixed combat sports and utilized elements of different kung fu styles, boxing and wrestling.
classes.description2: In Ancient Greece, such an example can be found in the art of pankration, a very specific martial art that combined boxing – which was very popular in Ancient Greece – and wrestling – which probably originated in Mesopotamia or Ancient Egypt.
classes.description3: Pankration was extremely popular (even the most popular sport, according to some historian) in Ancient Greece and there is vague evidence that similar mixed combat sports were practiced in Ancient Japan, Egypt and India.

classes.name: Brazillian Jiu Jitsu
classes.description1: Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu (BJJ) is a martial art and combat sport that originated in Brazil in the early 20th century. It focuses on grappling and ground fighting techniques, emphasizing the use of leverage and technique over strength and size.
classes.description2: BJJ techniques involve taking an opponent down to the ground and controlling them through various positions, such as mount, guard, and side control, with the goal of submitting them through joint locks or chokes. BJJ also includes techniques for defending against strikes, throws, and other attacks. BJJ is practiced by people of all ages and skill levels, and is popular among both men and women.
classes.description3: It is widely used in mixed martial arts (MMA) competition, and is also used by law enforcement and military personnel as a form of self-defense training. BJJ has a strong focus on discipline, respect, and personal development, and is often described as a way of life by its practitioners.

classes.name: Bpxing
classes.description1: Boxing is a combat sport in which two fighters engage in a contest of strength, speed, reflexes, endurance, and skill by throwing punches at each other while wearing padded gloves. The sport has been around for thousands of years, with depictions of boxing found in ancient civilizations such as Greece and Rome.
classes.description2: In modern boxing, fighters compete in a square ring and are divided into weight classes to ensure fair matchups. The goal of the sport is to score more points than the opponent by landing punches on their upper body and head while avoiding being hit.
classes.description3: Boxers typically use a variety of techniques, such as jabs, hooks, crosses, uppercuts, and footwork, to maneuver around the ring and outmaneuver their opponent. The sport requires a high level of physical fitness and mental toughness, as well as discipline and training.
